Key Match Events: Pakistan chased down 345, the highest successful chase ever in a World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Rizwan: 'Always proud when you perform like that'
Shanaka: Mendis is in form and Sadeera has been playing well
Babar: Rizwan, the way he played... helped us with the partnership
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan won back-to-back games while Sri Lanka suffered their second successive defeat
Others: Theekshana: Our bowlers lacked experience of playing in India
Urooj Mumtaz: Dropping Fakhar after one game sends a wrong message to the dressing room
Jaffer: Pakistan should stick with Fakhar Zaman for two more games
